data.name: KeepUp Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Important Information - Season Updates


KeepUp Hunter is to be expanded with quarterly season-updates that will be available to users for free. These will include new playable maps, playable characters and extras. To use these expansions, you must have reached a certain rank in the game. See the game description.

Please refer to the KeepUp Hunter EULA.
Season-Updates are provided free of charge.


Important Information - DLC´s


With DLC's you can stand out from the crowd with great weapon attachments, skins and character changes.

All DLC's can also be included in season updates.

Please refer to the KeepUp Hunter EULA.
DLC's are paid products that are made available.


About the Game

KeepUp Hunter: A classic wave-based zombie game.


The world has been overrun by a ravenous zombie wave and everyone is fighting to survive on their own. Smaller groups have also joined forces to stop the zombies. Are you one of them?

Are you ready? Your concentration will be challenged to the point of exhaustion. How many waves can you manage? Compete alone or with friends in co-op mode with up to 3 players against the enemy zombie herd. Your task is to hold off the ravenous zombies for as long as possible. With each wave that starts, the zombie wave gets stronger. You earn points and can exchange them for new weapons, traps and other areas at any time.

Be ready to help your teammates at any time. When a player is injured, you'll hear it through a pulsating heart. You only have a few seconds to save him, otherwise he'll be lost forever until you finish your wave.

Single player and multiplayer mode


- Single player
- Multiplayer co-op mode up to 3 players

Level-Up and Rank System


KeepUp Hunter includes a level-up and rank system. Once you reach a certain level, you will be assigned a rank. The better you are, the higher your rank. Each rank unlocks more possible charactere and playable maps. Note the deposited information in the description.

If you die or get injured several times in the game, you will lose points, which can lead to losing the rank.

Difficulty level


The difficulty level increases additionally with the number of players.

Character has complex body mechanics


- Selectable characters
- Pleasant body movement

Weather System


Rain and fog - random system

Dynamic day / night cycle

With a great soundscape

data.short_description: Wave Based Zombie Apocalypse: The world has been overrun by a ravenous zombie wave and everyone is fighting to survive on their own. Smaller groups have also joined forces to stop the zombies. Are you one of them?
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Game is Good. Melee needs work.”
@[BH]Gold316

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence and gory scenes that may not be suitable for all audiences or ages. Frequent depiction of violence, blood or mutilation.
